name: LEVANA
description:
Beta

LEVANA

You never know what can be hidden in the dark, sometimes our words are those that kill us, do you think you can protect what you most want?

It is not always so simple or so clear if you think you can survive all this and go sane you can try, but can you get it?

Resume of the game

Levana is a horror game set in the medieval age, where you will have to find your levana daughter who, for some situations that she has not understood, has disappeared, call her to see your way, be careful with your tone that not only will she be listening to you ....

If you like puzzles games with added extension this will be your game try to follow your path without being heard by someone who does not have to listen to you, leave the house, if you can ...

How to play?

Levana is a game where you will have to play with sounds to avoid being caught, stealthily making noise while doing puzzles and getting keys passing in front of your biggest fears, be careful and do not make noise ...
